name: Wardrobe
description:
Mdm S is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She is presently diagnosed with gout and has challenges with her ambulation. 

THKMC is looking for a 2 door wardrobe to improve her living condition. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. 

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Adult Diaper (XL size, pull up)
description:
Mr H is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He had suffered a stroke which has affected the right side of his body. He is unable to walk for long distances and travels around with a motorized wheelchair. 

THKMC is looking for adult diaper donation. (XL size, pull up)

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please Whatsapp Xin Yi at 8292 2214.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.
    
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

Client’s mobility scooter has malfunctioned and she needs one with two seater so that they can send their child to school.

name: Ramp
description:
Ramp
Mdm M is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She is bedbound and relies on her helper and daughter for her daily ADLs.

THKMC is looking for a ramp to ensure that she is able to navigate the toilet safely. 

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. 

THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.
